name: Destruction Drift
description:
You are one of the universe's most famous pirates, but you still got to earn the love of the common folk. Raid the shores of the world, create ultimate destruction and use your opponents to impress everybody!

Get every enemy off your beloved ship by picking them up and shooting them out into the ocean with your cannons.
But be careful, your ship might break! Place yourself right/left of the steering wheel to maneuver around islands.
Score at least a certain number of points to gain all the love.
Move: Left Mouse
Interact: Right Mouse

_________________
